name: web-journey-recorder-pro
description: Chrome Extension for recording user journeys with Gemini AI

scripts.build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', { recursive: true }); fs.mkdirSync('dist/background', { recursive: true }); fs.mkdirSync('dist/scripts', { recursive: true }); fs.mkdirSync('dist/lib', { recursive: true });" && esbuild index.tsx background/service-worker.js scripts/content-script.js options.js lib/screenshot-service.js lib/sessions.js lib/recording-status.js lib/permissions.js --bundle --outdir=dist --format=esm --loader:.tsx=tsx --loader:.js=js --minify --define:process.env.API_KEY='""' && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['manifest.json', 'index.html', 'options.html', 'index.css'].forEach(f => fs.copyFileSync(f, 'dist/' + f));"
